text: 4:6 Jenesis 1:3; Aisaia 9:2; 2 Korin 3:18; 1 Pita 2:9; 2 Pita 1:19Fomɨra God kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Mɨtatemɨn aven, angazangarim otogh siragham.” Ezɨ Godɨn kamnangran angazangarim iza en navir averiabar ikia e gamizɨma, e Godɨn fofozir aghuiba iti. E Krais Iesusɨn guamɨn angazangarir kamɨn gara, egha e Godɨn angazangarim ko an gavgavim gɨfo.
